  STATE
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  v.
 </docketnumber>

  Jack Howard HOLLARS
 </attorneys>
 <docketnumber id="p-4">
  324A19-1
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-5">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>

  August 21, 2019
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-7">
  Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hollars, Jack Howard.
 </attorneys>

 </attorneys>

 </attorneys>

 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-11">

 </attorneys>

 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-13">
  Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-14">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of August 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-15">
  "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of August 2019."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-16">
   Davis, J. recused
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
